scripts.audit: npm run audit:npm && npm run audit:pip
scripts.clean: rimraf dist src/sacr.egg-info **/__pycache__ .coverage coverage.xml htmlcov && npm run uninstall
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && pip install -r ./requirements.build.txt && pip install -r ./requirements.test.txt && pip install -r ./requirements.txt
scripts.lint: npm run lint:pylint:check && npm run lint:isort:check && npm run lint:black:check
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:isort:fix && npm run lint:black:fix
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:report && npm run coverage:report:html && npm run coverage:report:xml
